TopicTitle: Rendezvous and Docking tutorial (from the ground)

Articles.Content:
So, this skill has been very important to me to get off of planets and moons with a station in orbit. Why? It could provide fuel, a safe haven for Kerbals, or even serve as a pit-stop. In the video below, I will show you one of the few techniques that you can use to dock with a space-station that is currently in orbit.

This is more directed towards people that struggle to rendezvous with orbiting crafts (while landed) and for those who struggle to dock too. It's not a full in-depth guide, just to give you the gist of what to do. If a full on tutorial is required, I will do it if necessary

Enjoy your new found skill!

If you have any feedback on what I should've done or if I can help you further, don't be afraid to ask. I will give you any information you need (to the best of my personal knowledge), all for my fellow kerbonauts
